overview: Mr. Richard Thomas Chalmers Chenevix-Trench is the Chief Investment Officer and Fund Manager at Sloane Robinson Investment Services Limited, which he joined in1995 and is the Portfolio manager at Vitruvius - Emerging Markets Equity. He manages the Emerging Markets and Asian portfolios. Mr. Chenevix-Trench also serves on the Advisory Board of Sloane Robinson Private Equity LLP. Mr. Chenevix-Trench previously worked for Baring Asset Management (BAM) from 1986 to 1995. … In 1991 he moved to London to establish the emerging markets investment division and was responsible for both investment process and business development. Prior to working at Baring, he was a Research Analyst at Warburg Securities in Hong Kong. Mr. Chenevix-Trench obtained a degree in Biochemistry from Imperial College, London.
